sql.content: SELECT 'uid=' + RTRIM(LTRIM(A.编码)) + ',ou=users,dc=wzyb,dc=com' AS userID ,RTRIM(LTRIM(A.编码)) AS userNo ,RTRIM(LTRIM(A.姓名)) AS userName ,LEFT(LTRIM(A.姓名) ,1) AS surname ,RTRIM(LTRIM(A.性别)) AS sex ,RTRIM(LTRIM(A.部门)) AS groupName ,RTRIM(LTRIM(A.联系电话)) AS tel ,RTRIM(LTRIM(A.籍贯)) AS city ,CONVERT(VARCHAR(100) ,GETDATE() ,120) AS lastTime FROM HR_JBXXB A ORDER BY 1

SELECT 'uid=' + RTRIM(LTRIM(A.Base_PerNo)) + ',ou=users,dc=wzyb,dc=com' AS userID ,RTRIM(LTRIM(A.Base_PerNo)) AS userNo ,RTRIM(LTRIM(A.Base_Pername)) AS userName ,LEFT(RTRIM(LTRIM(A.Base_Pername)) ,1) AS surname ,RTRIM(LTRIM(A.Base_CardNo)) AS cardNo ,A.Base_Modify_DateTime AS lastTime FROM General_Personnel A ,General_Group B WHERE A.Base_GroupID = B.Base_GroupID AND A.Base_IsDel = 0 AND B.Base_IsDel = 0 ORDER BY 1

SELECT 'uid=' + RTRIM(LTRIM(A.job_Number)) + ',ou=users,dc=wzyb,dc=com' AS userID ,RTRIM(LTRIM(A.job_Number)) AS userNo ,RTRIM(LTRIM(A.nickName)) AS userName ,LEFT(RTRIM(LTRIM(A.nickName)) ,1) AS surname ,RTRIM(LTRIM(A.uname)) AS loginName ,A.pwd AS loginPwd ,A.updateTime AS lastTime FROM Sys_User A WHERE A.job_Number IS NOT NULL AND A.job_Number != '' AND A.deleted = 0 ORDER BY 1

SELECT 'uid=' + RTRIM(LTRIM(A.job_Number)) + ',ou=users,dc=wzyb,dc=com' AS userID ,RTRIM(LTRIM(A.job_Number)) AS userNo ,RTRIM(LTRIM(A.nickName)) AS userName ,LEFT(RTRIM(LTRIM(A.nickName)) ,1) AS surname ,RTRIM(LTRIM(A.job_Number)) AS loginName ,A.pwd AS loginPwd ,A.updateTime AS lastTime FROM Sys_User A WHERE A.job_Number IS NOT NULL AND A.job_Number != '' AND A.deleted = 0 ORDER BY 1
